headline: Man’s Estate Drops Lawsuit Accusing Actor of Sex Assault
abstract: A Los Angeles County massage therapist, who died in September, had accused Mr. Spacey of groping him and making improper advances during a 2016 massage.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit that accused the actor Kevin Spacey of sexually assaulting a massage therapist in 2016 ended after the accuser’s estate dropped the case, court documents filed on Monday show.
